pullrequest.title: Change level opacity based on current building level

content.raw:
Small bug: If you make at least 3 floors, each with staircases, and delete a lower level (e.g. the first one), then the staircases on higher levels will become opaque, even though the walls and floors remain invisible.

Looks like this bug is not fixed by [PR 1316](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1316/building-editor-detach-all-child-manip).
